creator: Thibault, Jean Baptiste, 1810-1879. (author)
description: Thibault, Jean Baptiste: 1810-1879. Ordained at Red River, 1833; active in founding and consolidating Catholic missions at trading posts and Métis settlements along the Saskatchewan and Churchill River systems, 1842-1852; returned to Quebec, 1872 (Morgan, Dominion annual register, 1879; Morice, Dictionnaire historique). // Report on conditions in the Red River Settlement during the disturbance.
subject: Rebellions and Regimental Histories--Red River Rebellion
Red River Rebellion, 1869-70
Rouge, Rébellion de la rivière, 1869-1870
Red River Valley (Man.)--Description and travel
title: North-West Territories: Report of the very Reverend J.B. Thibault, G.V.
